segments.text: Good morning . I â€™ m Liu Yi , from China XYZ Company . We have an appointment with Mr . Thomas .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Welcome to ABC Company . We have been expecting you , please have a seat . I will call him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mr . Thomas will be here very soon . In the meantime , may I ask all of you to sign in so that I can issue your passes ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Should each of us write separately ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , please . Please print your name and company name , and the person you are going to see .
segments.speaker: S2
